content.question: Which of the following statements is true of aquatic biomes?

choices.label: Freshwater and marine biomes are evenly distributed on Earth.
Freshwater biomes are a vital source of drinking water.
Freshwater biomes supply a greater portion of Earthâ€™s oxygen than marine biomes.
Marine biomes include streams, rivers, ponds, and lakes.

content.answer: Freshwater biomes are a vital source of drinking water.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
